gran: 使成颗粒，使成粒状；使表面粗糙；
It has cost $ 60 million to produce Gran Turismo 5.
Microsoft has many solid racing franchises, but nothing Gran Turismo brings to the system.
微软的硬派赛车游戏不错, 但也能与跑车浪漫旅一争高下.
Pesquera Janus Gran Reserva 1986 " Moderately saturated red, with some brick at the rim. "
中等浓度的红色, 边缘带有砖红的 色泽.
